# MTLDispatchType.concurrent

**Case**

Sets a command encoder to dispatch encoded commands concurrently during your pass.

## Declaration

```swift
case concurrent
```

## Discussion

If you encode multiple commands that access a single resource, you’re responsible for synchronizing the memory operations to that resource. For more information, see [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/resource-synchronization].

## Execution dispatch types

- **MTLDispatchType.serial**: Sets a command encoder to dispatch encoded commands serially during your pass.
